Class Desk

    • model.basis.Desk

  • public class Desk
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for representation of game board.
    Author:
    Stanislav Smatana

      • pole

        protected Position[][] pole

    • Constructor Detail

      • Desk

        public Desk()
        Constructor creates default sized (8x8) desk with Figures placed on starting positions.

      • Desk

        public Desk(int dim)
        Constructor creates and initializes Desk with given dimension. Size of desk is dim x dim.
        Parameters:
        dim - Dimension of Desk.

      • Desk

        public Desk(java.lang.String str)
        Special constructor for debugging purposes. Constructs Desk with figures from given string representation. Only 8x8 Desk is supported. Each cell is represented by one char. Allowed chars and their meaning: X - empty cell C - cell with black man B - cell with white man V - cell with black king K - cell with white king
        Parameters:
        str - String representation of 8x8 desk.

    • Method Detail

        public Position getPositionAt(char c,
                     int r)
        Gets position at given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        c - Column
        r - Row
        Returns:
        Position object if coords. were valid, null otherwise.

      • getFigureAt

        public Figure getFigureAt(char c,
                 int r)
        Gets figure at given position.
        Parameters:
        c - Column
        r - Row
        Returns:
        Figure object if coords. were valid and t here was figure on given position, null otherwise.

      • onLastRow

        public boolean onLastRow(Position pos,
                Figure.Color col)
        Method determines if given position is in last row for given color.
        Parameters:
        pos - Position to be checked.
        col - Color of figures to determine.
